meanings.definition: The quality or state of being retiring or shy.
meanings.sent1: Her retiringnesses made it difficult for her to speak up in class.
meanings.sent2: His retiringnesses often led others to mistake his shyness for aloofness.
meanings.sent3: Despite her retiringnesses, she still managed to make a few close friends.
meanings.sent4: The retiringnesses of the turtle made it retreat into its shell at the slightest noise.
meanings.sent5: The retiringnesses of the librarian made her seem mysterious and intriguing to the students.

meanings.definition: The act of withdrawing from society or public life.
meanings.sent1: His retiringnesses from social events puzzled his friends.
meanings.sent2: The retiringnesses of the author after the book launch surprised everyone.
meanings.sent3: The retiringnesses of the cat from the noisy party was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The retiringnesses of the old tree from the bustling city life was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The retiringnesses of the retired professor were a topic of discussion among the students.
